title: Add government resources section with official website links

requirements.text: Create a Government Resources section component that displays a grid of quick access links to official government and regulatory websites including Income Tax Department, ROC (Registrar of Companies), MCA (Ministry of Corporate Affairs), SEBI, GST Portal, Professional Tax, MahaGST, RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority), and share market portals (NSE/BSE), with each link showing an icon, website name, and opening in a new tab

quotes:
add government websites and link
Income Tax department, ROc, MCA, SEBI, GST. Professional Tax, Mahagst, RERA, share market etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Government Resources section is displayed on the homepage
Each government website link includes an icon, website name, and description

Links include: Income Tax Department (https://www.incometax.gov.in/), ROC (https://www.mca.gov.in/content/mca/global/en/mca/master-data/MDS.html), MCA (https://www.mca.gov.in/), SEBI (https://www.sebi.gov.in/), GST Portal (https://www.gst.gov.in/), Professional Tax, MahaGST (https://mahagst.gov.in/), RERA (https://rera.maharashtra.gov.in/), NSE (https://www.nseindia.com/), and BSE (https://www.bseindia.com/)
All links open in a new browser tab
Section uses consistent styling with the existing emerald green and warm amber color scheme
Component is responsive and works on mobile devices

requirements.text: Integrate the Government Resources section into the main App.tsx layout, positioning it after the Notifications section and before the Tax Calculators section
acceptanceCriteria: Government Resources section appears in the correct position in the page flow
Navigation menu is updated to include smooth scrolling to the Government Resources section if needed
Section maintains proper spacing with adjacent sections

constraints: Use only official government website URLs
Maintain the existing emerald green and warm amber color scheme
Follow the existing component patterns and styling conventions
Ensure all external links open in new tabs for user convenience
nonGoals: Adding authentication or login functionality for government portals
Scraping or displaying live data from government websites
Creating backend storage for government website links
Implementing a content management system for the links

required: Government/regulatory website icon set including icons for Income Tax, ROC, MCA, SEBI, GST, Professional Tax, RERA, and stock market symbols in a consistent style (govt-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
